subject: isActive CONFIRMED WORKING! Still -36 active events gap
body:
Team,

Ran Ben's requested test:

## isActive Filter - NOW WORKING!
| Query | Express | AF TEST | Match |
|-------|---------|---------|-------|
| active=true | 384 | 348 | -36 gap |
| active=false | 2 | 2 | EXACT MATCH |

The isActive filter IS working correctly now.

## Remaining Issue
AF is missing 36 ACTIVE events (348 vs 384).

This is likely the recurring events issue or date range calculation.

Fulton - Can you compare your recurring events query to Express?

## Current Status
| Endpoint | Express | AF | Delta |
|----------|---------|-----|-------|
| Categories | 10 | 10 | PASS |
| Roles | 5 | 5 | PASS |
| Organizers | 49 | 47 | -2 |
| Venues | 64 | 66 | +2 |
| Events | 384 | 348 | -36 |

- Sarah
